extends Object
    Participant.

      Synchronizes server's history to peer based on the last zxid of peer.

    • Field Detail

      • transport

        protected final Transport transport
        Transport. Passed from QuorumZab.

      • persistence

        protected final PersistentState persistence
        Persistent state of Zab. Passed from QuorumZab.

      • stateMachine

        protected final StateMachine stateMachine
        State machine. Passed from QuorumZab.

      • serverId

        protected final String serverId
        ID of the participant. Passed from QuorumZab.

      • messageQueue

        protected final BlockingQueue<MessageTuple> messageQueue
        Shared message queue. Passed from QuorumZab and all the messages are enqueued from QuorumZab.

      • isBroadcasting

        protected volatile boolean isBroadcasting
        Whether the participant is in broadcasting phase or not.

      • lastDeliveredZxid

        protected Zxid lastDeliveredZxid
        The last delivered zxid. Passed from QuorumZab to avoid deliver duplicated transactions.

      • electedLeader

        protected String electedLeader
        The elected leader.

      • SYNC_MAX_BATCH_SIZE

        protected static final int SYNC_MAX_BATCH_SIZE
        Maximum batch size for SyncRequestProcessor. TODO We might want to expose this setting to the user.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • config

        protected final ZabConfig config
        The configuration for Zab. It's passed from QuorumZab.

      • failCallback

        protected org.apache.zab.QuorumZab.FailureCaseCallback failCallback
        Callback which will be called in different points of code path to simulate different kinds of failure cases.

      • stateChangeCallback

        protected org.apache.zab.QuorumZab.StateChangeCallback stateChangeCallback
        Callback interface for testing purpose.

      • participantState

        protected final ParticipantState participantState
        The State for Zab. It will be passed accross different instances of Leader/Follower class.

      • getMessage

        protected abstract MessageTuple getMessage()
                                    throws TimeoutException,
                                           InterruptedException
        Gets a message from the queue.
        Returns:
        a message tuple contains the message and its source.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - in case of timeout.
        InterruptedException - it's interrupted.

      • getExpectedMessage

        protected MessageTuple getExpectedMessage(ZabMessage.Message.MessageType type,
                              String source)
                                   throws TimeoutException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Gets the expected message. It will discard messages of unexpected type and source and returns only if the expected message is received.
        Parameters:
        type - the expected message type.
        source - the expected source, null if it can from anyone.
        Returns:
        the message tuple contains the message and its source.
        Throws:
        TimeoutException - in case of timeout.
        InterruptedException - it's interrupted.

      • waitForSync

        protected void waitForSync(String peer)
                    throws InterruptedException,
                           TimeoutException,
                           IOException
        Waits for a synchronization message from peer.
        Parameters:
        peer - the id of the expected peer that synchronization message will come from.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - in case of interruption.
        TimeoutException - in case of timeout.
        IOException - in case of IO failure.

      • changePhase

        protected abstract void changePhase(Participant.Phase phase)
                             throws IOException
        Change the phase of current participant.
        Parameters:
        phase - the phase change(DISCOVERING/SYNCHRONIZING/BROADCASTING).
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of IO failure.
